11.content: Team red consists of 5 teenage girls. They are; kaitlyn, a short, talkative girl with blonde hair. Marie, a very short fun loving girl with brown hair. Brenna, a drama filled girl with brown hair. Christy, a fun loving, freckle faced, red head. And Brittany, a bipolar,blonde girl who is very trusting. What will this team do first?
11.title: Team red

112.content: Team blue devises a plan to pick of one of the members of team blue when they least expect it. They decide to split up into pairs of two and three to pick off two different girls from team blue. Kaitlyn and Marie go for Grace, while Brittany, Brenna and Christy go for Emily.
112.title: make a plan

1121.content: Marie and Kaitlyn head up to graces house in the afternoon. They look through the window to see grace home alone watching tv. It's rare that team blue is disbanded like this and team red has taken full advantage. Grace is laying on the couch on her stomach with her feet dangling over the end of the couch. She is facing the TV. Marie and Kaitlyn sneak through the window and come up right behind grace. What do they do.
1121.title: Marie and kaitlyn

11211.content:
They quickly decide to tickle her feet which are hanging over the edge of the couch. Kaitlyn jumps up and sits on graces legs trapping her ankles. As grace starts to freak out, Marie quickly begins tickling her feet. "Hmmphfff " grace squeals holding in her laughter.
"Ooo is someone's feet ticklish?" Taunts Marie.
Marie begins to take her fingers up and down graces soles until she cracks
Hahahahahahahaha stahahahpp itttthahaha
What do they do next
11211.title: Tickle her feet

info.brief_description: 2 Opposing teams are formed to battle each other with tickling for a large reward.
info.description: One man approaches 10 girls with a huge reward for the team that can out tickle the other. Even though the girls were reluctant, they ultimately agreed.
